data.title: WikoPOS
data.desc: Wisata Kopi Point of Sales, Web-Based App for managing Transaction Data and Products, Print Invoice, See or Print the Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Yearly income.

data.title: Art3mis
data.desc: Battle color by tapping on your side, inspired by FingerBattle on Appstore by Rafael Rzendaal, named from Ready Player One Character Art3mis.
